mapper.insert: insert into address(mno, rec_name, rec_phone, addr_code, addr, addr_detail, addr_name, is_default) values (#{mno}, #{recName}, #{recPhone}, #{addrCode}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{addrName}, #{isDefault})
insert into orders(orno, mno, status, total_price, order_at, is_pickup) values (#{orno}, #{mno}, #{status}, #{totalPrice}, now(), #{isPickup})
insert into order_detail(orno, prno, book_qty, price, status) values (#{orno}, #{prno}, #{bookQty}, #{price}, #{status})
insert into payment(orno, measure, price, status, reg_at, card_name, imp_uid) values (#{orno}, #{measure}, #{price}, #{status}, now(), #{cardName}, #{impUid})
insert into delivery(orno, rec_name, rec_phone, addr_code, addr, addr_detail, addr_memo) values (#{orno}, #{recName}, #{recPhone}, #{addrCode}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{addrMemo})
mapper.select: select * from address where mno = #{mno} and is_default = "Y"
mapper.delete: delete from cart where mno = #{mno} and prno = #{prno}
